summary: 07/2013 SERVICE ESC MSG AND SYMBOL CAME ON , DEALER UNABLE TO FIND    01/07/2014 SAME    01/15/2014 AGAIN, GM PAID HALF OF THE REPAIR, BECAUSE THE FIRST TIME IT HAPPEN AND WAS NOTICE BY DEALER, I BELIEVE GM SHOULD PAID THE WHOLE COST, AS THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE , EFFECTS STEERING AND STABILIZATION OF THE VEHICLE.  *TR
